repereScreen(Point2D, double, double) - Static method in class com.geom.MVCControllers.OutputUser
Changes the coordinate of a point so that it is expressed in the original frame
repereUser(Point2D, double, double) - Static method in class com.geom.MVCControllers.OutputUser
Changes the view's frame so that the model is expressed in the user frame The board has its frame that is not whose Y axis pointing down Hence if the user enter (0, 10), the view should actually get (0, -10) Also performs a dilation so that the point are displayed significantly to the user

Rhombus - Class in com.geom.model
Implements a particular quadrilateral shape model: A rhombus In Euclidean geometry, a rhombus(â—Š), plural rhombi or rhombuses, is a simple (non-self-intersecting) quadrilateral whose four sides all have the same length.
